description:
Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

developer: CNT INTERAKTIF BILGI TEKNOLOJILERI YAZILIM SANAYI VE TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
To find Qibla direction, you don't need an internet connection! Low size app that shows 100% Qibla Direction worldwide. Simple & Smart Qibla compass.

100% Qibla Finder helps muslims to find Qibla direction all around the World. The direction of Kaaba in Mecca (Makkah) is pointed out with an arrow on the map, so that you can adjust your direction before you start your prayer.

You do not need internet to see where the Qibla is. 100% Qibla Finder shows you where the Qibla is even on offline mode with the help of its compass feature.

Your direction is located accurately through the GPS feature in the app.

You can re-detect your location with “Find my location” feature to be sure about directions.

You can share 100% Prayer and Qibla app on Facebook and other Social Networks with your friends.

You need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually re-arrange your location by pressing the marker.

Additional features include:

- Select from various map or compass modes

- Customize your location marker

- Locate the nearest mosques to your current location

Download Qibla Finder 100% now!

Privacy & Terms : https://www.muslimassistant.com/privacy-terms.html

app_name: 百度地图-打车公交出行，吃住玩常用交通服务平台
developer: Beijing Baidu Netcom Science & Technology Co.,Ltd
description:
百度地图——科技让出行更简单！

【智能导航】
-路况实时更新，推荐更优路线，智能躲避拥堵
-智能定位，GPS信号弱也能持续导航 
-公交导航到站提醒，实时公交覆盖多城
【智能规划】
-提供包含打车、驾车、公交、步行、骑行、火车、飞机、客车、货车、摩托车等出行方式的智能规划方案
-未来通行时间智能预估，精准预估到达时间，规划路线更精准，更符合用户不同的出行或驾驶习惯 
-全国范围内，提供多种交通方式组合的智能出行方案
-时间优先，躲避拥堵，少收费，不走高速等多种路线偏好任你选择
【低价打车】
-打车惊喜特惠，周周领大额红包
-多种车型智能比价，叫车快人一步
-打车有保障，隐私保护，全程安全陪伴
【智能语音】
-语音技术行业领先，可实现全端唤醒，全局交互
-喊“小度小度”，轻松查路线、搜地点、问天气，沿途搜等
-只需9句话，生成个人定制语音包，并支持地图全场景使用
【智能推荐】
-根据个人出行时间、方式等偏好，个性化推荐出行方案
-发现周边，探索吃喝玩乐好去处
-智能旅游，游玩路线推荐、AI导游跟随讲解、AR导览实景沉浸式游玩体验，让你玩转景区

【温馨提示】
百度地图的语音导航和电子狗会持续使用GPS定位服务，切换至后台播放时仍会保持GPS连接，会影响电量消耗和电池续航时间。
【遇到问题请联系】
感谢您使用百度地图，如有任何问题您可在“我的--客服中心”中进行反馈，也可以通过以下方式进行反馈：
官方微信公众号：百度地图/baiduditu
官方新浪微博：@百度地图
官方客服电话：400-099-8998

The only app that combines real time alerts with the best offline radar detection alert system. With Radarbot, you will have the best radar alerts, real time traffic alerts and specific speed limit alerts for different vehicles (cars, motorbikes, trucks and commercial vehicles) in one powerful app. Focus on what really matters while driving and enjoy your journey.

With Radarbot, drive more peacefully. Safer. Better.

SPEED CAMERA WARNINGS
Enjoy driving without having to worry about risking your safety or driving licence. Avoid traffic fines and penalties by receiving clear warnings before passing speed cameras:

- Fixed speed cameras.
- Possible mobile speed cameras (frequent areas).
- Tunnel speed cameras.
- Average speed cameras (the app displays the average speed).
- Traffic light cameras.

Plus:
- Dangerous driving areas.
- Seat belt or cell phone use cameras.
- Restricted area access control cameras.
- Potholes and speed bumps on the road.

* FEATURES:
- Works in any country.
- Compatible with other apps. You can use Radarbot together with other GPS navigators or your favourite music app. You will still receive alerts in the background or while the screen is turned off.
- Alerts only in the direction you are driving. The app automatically ignores speed cameras for traffic going in the opposite direction or off route.
- Voice alerts.
- Sound alerts when approaching a speed camera or going over the speed limit.
- Vibration mode for motorists.
- Fully configurable warning distances and parameters.
- Automatic Bluetooth connection and startup.
- Compatible with Apple Watch.

REAL TIME ALERTS
Real time alerts will warn you of any unexpected circumstances. Radarbot has a community of over 50 million drivers worldwide with whom you can share and receive alerts. Find out immediately what is happening on the road and avoid traffic jams, hazards, accidents, mobile speed cameras, police, helicopters, drones, and much more.

SPEED CAMERA UPDATE
Radarbot has the most powerful, up-to-date speed camera database in the world. Our team of experts perform daily updates to ensure that the database always contains the very latest information. Not a single speed camera can escape the prying eyes of Radarbot!

RADARBOT WORLDWIDE
Try our totally "FREE" version for as long as you like. If you want to get the full experience, you can try "Radarbot GOLD" and "Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" with integrated GPS navigation, unique advantages and, of course, no advertising.

GPS NAVIGATION AND SPEED LIMITS
Discover the power of Radarbot. The GOLD version offers everything you need on the road in a single app: GPS navigation, speed cameras and speed limits. Even if you don't have an internet connection, you will still arrive safe and sound at your destination. Get speed camera alerts wherever you are in the world without having to worry about using up your mobile data.

Where would you like to go?

* FEATURES:
- Offline navigation and 3D maps.
- Possibility of choosing a route with fewer speed cameras.
- Road speed limits.
- Alerts for school areas and associated speed cameras.
- Radarbot co-pilot. Put your seat belt on!

ARE YOU A PROFESSIONAL DRIVER?
"Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" includes everything a professional driver could need:

- Routes with special restrictions for lorries and commercial vehicles.
- Speed limits and specific speed cameras for lorries.
- Distance alerts adapted to heavy vehicles.

If you have any doubts or queries, we would be more than happy for you to get in touch with us at radarbot@iteration-mobile.com or by using the customer support option inside the app.

Download Radarbot now and become a member of the "Enjoy driving!" movement.

* Continuous use of GPS in the background can drastically reduce battery life.

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

developer: Changsha Duyou Network Technology Co., Ltd
description:
Speedometer GPS: Speed ​​Monitor is a high-precision GPS speedometer that integrates speed monitoring, trip recording, HUD head-up display, speeding reminder and other functions. It provides real-time and accurate speed tracking and navigation assistance for drivers, cyclists, runners and outdoor explorers. Whether it is daily commuting, long-distance travel, or racing competition, this Speedometer app is your ideal choice!

Core functions

Accurate GPS speed measurement

Relying on high-precision GPS technology, it displays the current speed, average speed, and maximum speed in real time to ensure accurate speed measurement. Supports kilometer/hour (km/h) and mile/hour (mph) two unit switching.

Smart speeding alarm

Set a personalized speed limit value. Once the speed is exceeded, the application will issue an alarm to remind you, effectively preventing speeding and helping you drive safely. And it supports 4 preset speed limits, which can be switched with a single click, allowing you to operate more safely while driving!

HUD head-up display mode

After enabling HUD mode, place the phone under the windshield to project the speed information onto the windshield, making night driving safer.

Driving data record

Automatically record detailed data such as travel time, driving distance, stay time, altitude, etc. Allowing you to easily view historical travel data or share it.

Built-in map

The built-in map can display the current location in real time and draw the driving trajectory to prevent getting lost.

Picture-in-Picture Mode (PiP)

Enable Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode to view speed information in real time while using other applications.
Suitable for scenarios such as navigation and music playback, so that speed measurement no longer affects other operations.
The window size and position can be adjusted to ensure the best visual experience while driving.

Altimeter & Altitude Measurement

Built-in accurate altitude measurement function, real-time monitoring of current altitude, suitable for mountain driving, cycling and outdoor adventures.

Speedometer helps you drive safely, accurately measure speed, and avoid speeding tickets! Download now to experience professional speed measurement service!

Free features:

The following core features are available without a subscription:

Real-time speed measurement

Remaining mileage statistics

Set maximum speed limit

Subscription features (premium features):

Unlock the full feature experience and obtain access through subscription:

Head-up display (HUD) mode

Picture-in-picture (PIP) mode

Map navigation integration

Driving data recording and statistics

Change speed dashboard style

Automatic renewal terms

Subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account. Payment will be charged to the account immediately after confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and the renewal amount will be determined. Users can manage or cancel subscriptions in "Settings" > "Apple ID" > "Subscriptions". After the free trial (if any) ends, the system will automatically start the subscription according to the selected plan unless canceled in advance.

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/duyou-privacy-policy
Terms: https://sites.google.com/view/duyou-terms

بحمد لله لأول مرة على اجهزة آيفون آببود وآيباد سنسمع الاذان كاملا عند كل صلاة دون الحاجة الى فتح التطبيق
هذا التطبيق يعرض أوقات الصلاة، القبلة بوصلة الاتجاه، التاريخ الهجري، مواقيت منبه 
الصلاة، كل هذه الميزات في هذا التطبيق الرائع، 

حساب أوقات الصلاة 
بإستخدام نظام تحديد الموقع يقوم التطبيق بعرض أوقات الصلاة (الفجر، الشروق، الظهر، العصر، المغرب، العشاء) 

 تستطيع اختيار المدينة يدويا من خلال صفحة البحث اذا كنت لا تريد ان تستخدم نظام تحديد المواقع 

 بمجرد فتح التطبيق تجد شاشة عرض رائعة تعرض لك إتجاه القبلة واوقات الصلاة والوقت المتبقي للصلاة القادمة والتاريخ الهجري. 

 خمس طرق لحساب اوقات الصلاة 
 تعديل أوقات الصلاة بما يناسبك 
 صور عالية الجودة تناسب شاشة الآيفون والايباد الريتينا 
 تستطيع اختيار اي دولة واي مدينة في العالم لتقوم بحساب الصلاة 

 منبه الصلاة 
عند كل موعد صلاة سيقوم الجهاز بالآذان بالصوت الذي اخترته من الاعدادات 


ملاحظةة: 
نرجو منكم العلم بان وقت الصلاة يحسب بناء علي الموقع الحالي،لذلك ممكن ان يكون هناك زياد او نقصان لدقائق تستطيع الدخول الى الاعدادات وتقوم بإضافة او خصم دقائق حتى يتوافق مع مدينتك وستقو بذلك مرة واحدة فقط 

ملاحظة اخرى 
تحديد القبلة يعتمد علي جهاز البوصلة الموجود داخل الجهاز لذلك يتأثر حسابها بتأثير البوصلة ، حتى تتاكد من حساب القبلة بدقة ارجوك ارجوك ارجوك ابعد جهازك عت الاجهزة التي تحتوي علي مغناطيس والاجهزة الاخرى وقم بتحريك الجهاز جيدا حتى تتفعل البوصلة 
وبإذن الله سيكون الحساب صحيح

Transform every journey into valuable data with GPS Speedometer - the most comprehensive speed tracking app for driving, cycling, boating, and beyond. Experience professional-grade features that keep you informed and in control.

CORE FEATURES:
- Real-time GPS speed tracking with precision accuracy
- Comprehensive trip computer: speed, distance, altitude, heading, duration
- Trip recording with route tracking
- Live map view with real-time position tracking
- Save and export your journeys

ADVANCED CAPABILITIES:
Picture in Picture Mode (PRO):
- Keep your speed visible while using other apps
- Resizable floating speedometer overlay
- Perfect for navigation or music apps

Heads-Up Display (HUD):
- Project speed onto your windshield for safer driving
- Mirrored display mode for reflection viewing
- Keep eyes on the road while monitoring speed

Road-Based Speed Limits (PRO):
- Automatic speed limit detection for your current road
- Real-time alerts when exceeding limits
- Works worldwide with smart inference technology
- Customizable warning offsets and sounds

Performance Metrics:
- G-Force meter tracks acceleration and braking forces
- Enhanced altitude tracking with barometric sensors
- Moving vs. stopped time analysis
- Maximum and average speed calculations

SEAMLESS INTEGRATION:
- Apple Music display and playback controls
- View current song without switching apps
- Control your music while tracking your journey

COMPLETE CUSTOMIZATION:
- Choose units: KM/H, MPH, or Knots
- Multiple display modes and layouts
- Extensive theme selection with custom colors
- Dark/Light mode support
- Adjustable speedometer scale
- Portrait/Landscape with orientation lock
- Left or right-handed speedometer placement

PRO SUBSCRIPTION UNLOCKS:
- Unlimited trip saving and recording
- Export routes in GPX format
- Road-based speed limit detection & alerts
- Picture in Picture mode
- Weather information with forecasts
- Custom app icons
- All themes and colors

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION:
- Free to download with core features always free
- Optional PRO subscription for advanced features
- Cancel anytime via App Store settings
- Payment charged to Apple ID at confirmation
- Auto-renews unless canceled 24 hours before period ends
- Manage subscriptions in your App Store account settings

IMPORTANT NOTES:
- Requires GPS/Location Services for speed tracking
- Not compatible with WiFi-only iPad models
- GPS accuracy varies with signal strength and environment
- Best accuracy in open areas with clear sky view
- Continuous GPS use impacts battery life
- Never interact with device while driving - safety first!

Love the app? Rate us on the App Store!
Your feedback helps us improve and add new features.

Terms of Use: https://speedometer.app/terms

Explore a whole new driving experience! We bring you a revolutionary integration that combines a comprehensive speedometer, odometer, and altimeter, all powered by your phone's GPS.

What's even more impressive is the introduction of our Heads-Up Display (HUD) mode, effortlessly projecting your speed onto the windshield, enhancing both the joy and convenience of driving.

With our Speedometer GPS Trip Tracker, we offer a variety of trip modes to choose from, whether it's walking, running, biking, driving, or even sailing and flying. You can easily select and start recording your trip in any mode.

This speedometer not only provides real-time and precise speed monitoring but also captures and records comprehensive trip data. From highest speed, average speed, trip distance, and altitude to direction, trip movement and stop time, temperature, and weather information, we save and display it all for you. You can even export this data in GPX format for further analysis and sharing.

Customization is also one of our key features. Depending on the trip mode, you can freely set the dial scale and speed limits on the speedometer. When you exceed the speed limit, the app will alert you in a highly noticeable way, helping you stay within the designated speed.

The map mode allows you to see the real-time trajectory of your current trip, offering both 2D and 3D map views for your selection. You can also choose from a variety of map styles to suit your personal preferences.

But the HUD mode is where we truly elevate your driving experience. By projecting trip information onto your car's windshield, you can effortlessly access trip data without having to divert your attention to your phone. Simply enable the auto-switch to HUD mode in the settings. Please note that before engaging with these features, ensure you have safely parked your vehicle and maintain focus on the road for safety.

Come and experience this groundbreaking Speedometer GPS Trip Tracker, making your trips smarter and more convenient than ever before!

You can use this application for free, but we also offer additional rich features for users who wish to purchase or subscribe.

Regarding subscriptions:
- Cancel your subscription at any time.
- Upon confirmation of purchase, payment will be charged to your Apple ID account.
- Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- After purchase, you can manage and cancel subscriptions through your App Store account settings.

Usage guidelines:
1.The app requires location permission to fully function.
2.The Wi-Fi version of the iPad may not work properly as it lacks a GPS module.
3.While the app is optimized to minimize battery consumption, continuous GPS usage may still impact battery life. The GPX file export shows changes in battery level.
4.Please refrain from operating the app during driving and prioritize safety.

Terms of Service: http://cpux.gmud.top/web/gpsfit/termsofservice.html
Contact us: commonemails@163.com

 تطبيق بوصلة القبلة: حدد اتجاه القبلة بدقة وسرعة أينما كنت 

لماذا تُعد بوصلة القبلة رفيقك الأساسي في الصلاة؟
- تتكيف البوصلة تلقائيًا مع موقعك الحالي لتحديد اتجاه القبلة بدقة في كل مرة
- استخدم كاميرا جهازك لعرض اتجاه القبلة في محيطك
- قم بتدوير جهازك لمعايرة البوصلة لقراءات دقيقة
- اختر من بين عدة خيارات للون التطبيق، مع دعم كامل للوضع الداكن
- افتح التطبيق مباشرة من مركز التحكم للوصول السريع
- تصميم بسيط وسهل يتيح لك التركيز أثناء استعمال التطبيق

حمّل بوصلة القبلة الآن واستخدمه بثقة في أي مكان وزمان

شروط الاستخدام:
https://apprime.studio/terms-of-service/
سياسة الخصوصية:
https://apprime.studio/privacy-policy/

• Detailed offline maps with places that don't exist on other maps
• Cycling routes, hiking trails, and walking paths
• Contour lines, elevation profiles, peaks, and slopes
• Turn-by-turn walking, cycling, and car navigation with voice guidance
• Fast offline search
• Bookmark everything you need, import and share KML, KMZ, GPX
• Dark mode to protect your eyes
• … and many other features!

Organic Maps is pure and organic, made with love:

• Respects your privacy
• Saves your battery
• No unexpected mobile data charges

Organic Maps is free from trackers and other bad stuff:

• No ads
• No tracking
• No data collection
• No phoning home
• No annoying registration
• No mandatory tutorials
• No noisy email spam
• No push notifications
• No crapware
• No pesticides

At Organic Maps, we believe that privacy is a fundamental human right:

• Organic Maps is an indie community-driven project
• The code is open-sourced
• The maps data is taken from OpenStreetMap, also community-driven project
• We protect your privacy from Big Tech’s prying eyes
• Stay safe no matter wherever you are

Reject surveillance, embrace your freedom, and support the community.

Give Organic Maps a try!

developer: CEBINDEKI PAZAR E-TICARET ALISVERIS HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
Location: Your Comprehensive Location and Orientation Companion

Discover the power of myLocation, a user-friendly tool designed to simplify location search and sharing. With just a few screen clicks, effortlessly navigate between your current and specified locations. Need to uncover the coordinates or address of your current spot? Look no further than iLocation.

Whether you have an important appointment to explain or find yourself in need of your current whereabouts, myLocation has you covered. Simply pin your desired location on the map and effortlessly select your preferred transportation method to share it with others.

Key Features at a Glance:

Instant display of current location information upon app launch
Detailed coordinates and altitude display for your current or specified position
Seamlessly view the address of any location
Stay on track with the built-in Altimater bearing feature
Customize your map view with the option to switch between General and Satellite formats
Set the map's center, allowing you to easily check coordinates and addresses
Enter coordinates directly for precise location selection
Input an address of your choice to designate an arbitrary location (Pro feature)
Save maps directly to your camera roll or clipboard
Create a personal list of favorite locations for quick access
Preserve and share specific location information and maps via various social media platforms
Share locations instantly with a unique URL, ensuring immediate connectivity for recipients
With myLocation, no words are necessary to convey your whereabouts. Let the app speak for you, providing accurate location details effortlessly.

Experience the power of Location GPS, a versatile application for determining geographical orientation. This feature-packed tool goes beyond a traditional, offering an array of data displays such as altitude, longitude, latitude, weather information, water boiling point, air data, magnetic field data, and more.

Discover Key Features:

Immerse yourself in a highly accurate elevation experience
Gain valuable insights into longitude, latitude, altitude, and real-time weather updates
Conveniently record and save your important locations for future reference
Harness the real-time GPS velocity measurement feature for precise speed tracking
Unlock Limitless Access with Subscriptions:

Access an expanded range of GEO data
Leverage accurate GPS speed measurement capabilities
Enjoy an ad-free user experience
Gain unlimited access to all app features through a subscription
Choose from monthly or yearly subscription plans based on your needs
Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase

It is at your service with its unlimited features.

• Choosing a location (Free)
• View location coordinate (Free)
• Save location information (Free)
• Add and change profile picture (Free)
• Sharing location (Pro)

Pro Version!

To get even more out of ILocation- subscribe to the Pro Version (Unlock all share and remove ads).

Subscription Pricing and Terms

Pro Version is only $6,49/month. Pricing in other countries may vary and charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country you live in.

The Pro Version subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go into your iTunes user account settings to manage your auto-renew and subscription settings.

Visit the site for Terms and Conditions.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Spot, document, and map plants wherever you go! With LeafTrail MAPS, you can log detailed information about each sighting—complete with photos, environmental data, and exact GPS coordinates. Visualize your plant discoveries on an interactive map and build your personal green atlas.

Speedometer Simple is a simple speedometer that is very easy to use. 

This app uses phone's GPS to accurately determine your speed.

Speedometer has large fonts and supports mph, km/h, and knots speed display. Optionally, city name and a compass can be shows on the screen. The app also shows the traveled distance. Average and maximum speed is displayed in an optional screen as well. Interface color can be set one of many pre-selected colors. Speedometer app can record the speed during your trips and provide post-trip statistics like maximum speed, traveled distance etc.

Find Your Direction with Clarity and Confidence — Anytime, Anywhere

Our app is designed to help you stay oriented with precision and peace of mind. Built with advanced geographic technology, it provides accurate and reliable direction detection wherever life takes you.

Features
• Interactive Map (free) — Explore your location and orientation with an easy-to-navigate map
• Customizable Interface (free) — Adjust styles and layout to match your preferences
• Dark Mode Support (free) — Enjoy a comfortable viewing experience anytime
• Qibla Compass (3-day free trial available; a purchase is required to access this content after trial — Find accurate Qibla direction wherever you are
• Prayer Times (3-day free trial available; a purchase is required to access this content after trial) — Access precise daily schedules tailored to your location
• Built-in calibration guide for improved accuracy
• Helpful tips for device alignment and orientation

Tips for Best Accuracy
• Keep your device away from metal and electronic objects
• Calibrate occasionally using the built-in guide (figure-8 motion)
• Enable Location Services for improved precision

Subscription
A 3-day free trial is available for full access to premium features, including the Qibla compass and prayer times.
After the trial, continued access requires an active subscription (a purchase is required to access this content after trial)
You can cancel anytime during the trial period.

Terms of Use: https://qiblacompass.world/terms
Privacy Policy: https://qiblacompass.world/privacy

developer: BEKART TECH BILISIM TEKNOLOJI INSAAT TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
القبلة - البوصلة للقبلة

- البوصلة للقبلة
- أوقات الصلاة
- أسماء الله الحسنى
- المساجد القريبة
- مسبحة - القبلة
- الاستماع إلى مبارك القرآن الكريم
- خطب الجمعة
- تسبيح
- الاستماع إلى الأذان
- حديث نبوي (اليومي)

‎هدفنا هو مساعدة المسلمين حول العالم لقضاء صلاتهم وذلك عن طريق تقديم أداة تعرض اتجاه القبلة. لن تحتاج الآن للبحث عن شخص يعرف اتجاه القبلة، أو القيام بالحسابات اعتماداً على موقع الشمس، أو البحث عن اتجاه الشمال أو البحث عن المسجد.

‎يمكنك باستخدام "القبلة" الاطمئنان إلى أنه أينما كنت حول العالم تستطيع بلمسة زر واحدة أن تعرف اتجاه الكعبة. يستخدم هذا التطبيق تقنية GPS والبوصلة المدمجة في جهاز iPad الخاص بك لتحديد الموقع بدقة واتجاه الكعبة

‎يُرجى إرسال أية اقتراحات للتحسين إلى قسم الدعم لدينا على البرد الإلكتروني.

للاطلاع على "الشروط والاستخدام" ، يرجى زيارة موقعنا على الإنترنت: 
https://www.escapee.info/alqibla-terms-and-conditions

Discover the world in a whole new way with Satellite Map - Earth View!
View high-definition 3D satellite imagery, navigate detailed maps, and uncover breathtaking views of Earth. Whether you’re curious about distant countries, planning a trip, or simply exploring from home, this app is your perfect companion for uncovering the wonders of our planet.

Key Features:
• Satellite Imagery: View high-definition satellite maps with incredible detail.
• Street View: Explore streets and neighborhoods with immersive 360-degree panoramas.
• 3D Maps & Globe: Experience Earth in 3D with an interactive globe and terrain visualization.
• World Atlas: Access geographical details of countries, capitals, and flags.
• Real-Time Navigation: Find your location and navigate with accurate GPS support.
• Detailed Views: Zoom in to explore landscapes, landmarks, and buildings.
• Global Coverage: Explore cities, continents, and remote areas across the world.

Why Choose Satellite Map - Earth View?
• Perfect for virtual travel and exploration.
• Discover historical landmarks, famous locations, and natural wonders.
• Use as an educational tool for students and geography enthusiasts.
• Navigate streets with ease using immersive Street View mode.

Whether you’re planning your next adventure, exploring the unknown, or simply enjoying the beauty of Earth, Satellite Map - Earth View puts the world at your fingertips.

Download now and start your journey around the world!

Start with essential features for free. Premium subscription unlocks enhanced map providers, interactive country borders with flag visualization, and additional map styles. To take full advantage of enhanced map sources, advanced features, and a seamless ad-free experience, subscribe now!

Your subscription automatically renews for continued access to premium features. You can manage your subscription preferences and turn off auto-renewal anytime in your account settings.

Privacy Policy: https://www.ankagis.com/satellitemap/privacy/
Terms of Use: https://www.ankagis.com/satellitemap/tos/

Create, import, export tracks with waypoints.  Supports offline maps, no time limits, no ads.

The main functions of the application:
- compatible with Apple Silicon MacBook.
- new fast engine from MapBox.
- convenient and fast loading of maps.
- support for UTM coordinate system.
- route planner.
- pedometer with viewing data for the last three months (steps, distance).
- determination of the height of any waypoint.
- search by address.
- search by coordinates.
- compass.
- processing and optimization of tracks.
- loading and unlimited storage of maps of the travel area.
- supports all import and export methods available for your device with services, friends and applications in .gpx format.
- color gradient for speed and height, if this information is in the imported track.
- color gradient for speed and height for recorded tracks.
- recording speed and altitude in the track.
- relief contours in outdoor mode
- extended track information: average and maximum speed, track duration by time and distance, number of waypoints and number of steps.
- different units of measurement: miles, kilometers, feet, meters.
- pedometer when recording a track and saving information.
- work in the background.
- viewing one or more tracks in any application mode, including the recording mode of another track.
- installation, editing, deletion of waypoints in any application mode and anywhere.
- the ability to adjust the quality of the track, distance filters, energy saving mode.
- export and import of tracks and waypoints to various services - Open Street Map and others.
- has a pointer to the target waypoint and shows the distance to it. Easy target waypoint selection in several ways.
- display of additional information on the screen - scale, coordinates, height, speed, number of steps.
- shows the current distance traveled by the track and the travel or walk time.
- has several map styles - satellite, streets, combo and dark.
- Supports dark theme .
- easy start and stop of tracking in several ways.
- the ability to continue any previously recorded or imported track.
- several modes of map orientation - by the heading of the phone, in the direction of travel, centering and to the north.
- Possibility of tilting the map with double pinch.
- quick and easy selection and viewing of saved tracks, waypoints and maps.
- speed and altitude graphs can be scaled and scrolled.
- in the settings link to the user manual .

- Terms of service: https://appsupport.store/terms/
- Privacy policy: https://appsupport.store/privacy/

Choose and save your routes, create a collection of tracks with waypoints, share with friends, mark interesting places on the map, download ready-made tracks and waypoints in GPX format.
